about_the_game:
In this text-based, choose-your-own-adventure style RPG, you step into the role of a native islander in a realm on the brink of a tumultuous period. The game centers on the island of Ragulon, a land divided by cultural tension and impending threats.

Players will be challenged to navigate complex social structures, balancing between the obligations of their native culture and the demands of the dominant regime. As rumors of a distant menace spread across the island, the stability of Ragulon and its people hangs in the balance.

Interaction is pivotal in shaping the narrative. Simple gestures, casual comments, or strategic silence can all influence the course of events. The choices you make will directly affect your character's journey and the island's fate.

THEURGIC explores themes highly relevant in our contemporary world, delving into concepts such as identity, allegiance, moral ambiguity, and the consequences of colonization.

The game is illustrated by artist Ori-Guy James.

Welcome to Ragulon.
